lexUnit.name: incompetence.n

corpus.description: Wall Street Journal Texts from the PropBank Project
corpus.name: PropBank

lexUnit.definition: FN: the quality of being incompetent

sentence.text: Throughout the trip my feelings toward him varied from fury at his incompetence to humour and pity .
